name: Duet: Maracas of Destiny
description:
Take the powerful Maracas of Destiny into your hands, play music with others, and explore our small world. Uncover the mystery of music as you gain followers through your inspiring performance.

Exploration of Unreal Engine 5 and sound-based games. Introduction to blueprints and visual scripting.

Jonathan Leland- sound design, music

Axi Ma - character controller, animation

Ben Rowland - level design, gameplay programmer
